footer.title: Notes:
goodsInfoDetails: LTL goods are recommended to have a volume not exceeding 15cbm (approximately 8 pallets) and a weight not exceeding 5 tons (11000lbs). If exceeded, please split the quote or refer.
For warehouse addresses, the dimensions should not exceed 240CM in length, and single items should weigh no more than 2 tons.
For non-warehouse addresses, the first dimension should not exceed 240CM, the second dimension should not exceed 120CM, and single items should weigh no more than 1 ton.
Additional fees apply for non-commercial addresses, such as construction sites, exhibition centers, hospitals, schools, residences, etc.
Special goods require separate inquiries, such as display screens, amplifiers, wigs, etc.
transportInfoDetails: LTL only picks up/delivers on working days.
The reference transit time does not include pickup/delivery day.
quoteInfoDetails: The reference price may fluctuate slightly due to factors such as fuel and weather. It is recommended to reserve space for cost fluctuations.
It is recommended to choose delivery by appointment to minimize dry run fees.
Loose cargo packaging type defaults to pallet (48*40inch).
Weight must include pallet average (50lbs per pallet).
The reference quote does not include insurance.
additionalRequirementsDetails: If the unloading conditions of the consignee are unclear, it is recommended to select liftgate + appt.
If the delivery address is residential, please select residential + liftgate + appt.
For restricted addresses, select limited access + liftgate + appt.
The default delivery time is 9am-4pm. If there are special appointment processes or warehouse requirements, please inquire separately.
